long_description: The Patagonia Black Hole 45L duffel is a highly water resistant and highly durable duffel designed to carry your gear to faraway places. This duffel protects your gear from rain, rough handling and miles of traveling abuse. Made from waterproof fabric with water-resistant construction and zippers; seams are not sealed. U-shaped lid allows quick access to the main compartment, while 2 zippered internal mesh pockets keeps small items organized. Padded bottom panel adds structure and cushions the load when your duffel gets tossed around by baggage handlers. Features handles with a snap closure and end haul-handles. 4 corner-mounted webbing daisy chains facilitate hauling and let you lash additional gear to the outside. Exterior zip pocket holds the stuff you need to access quickly. Fabric detail: 14.7-oz. 1200-denier polyester (50% solution-dyed) with a TPU-film laminate and Durable Water Repellent finish.
short_description: The Patagonia Black Hole 45L duffel is a highly water resistant and highly durable duffel designed to carry your gear to faraway places.
